name: Devil May Care Hoodie
description:
Regular Price $56.00

Devil May Care distressed hoodie in vintage black.  These hoodies are adorned with the DMC logo on the front and the Devil May Care Clothing Company banner on the back.  Our hand dyed unisex zip hoodie is super soft and comfortable.  Made from 100% Combed Cotton Brushed 8.5oz.  Wash in cold water, line drying recommended.

name: DMC Crest Baseball Hat
description:
Regular Price $12.00

The DMC Crest flat bill snapback has a dark grey front panel adorned with the DMC crest pattern print.  The hat also features the Devil May Care logo on the back of the hat.  The under side of the bill is also dark grey.

name: You Can't Fight City Hall
description:
"You Can't Fight City Hall" in black is from our Antiques series.  The illustrations in the Antiques Series come from a stack of designs found in the trunk that spawned the 2010 rebirth of Devil May Care Clothing Company.

Adorned with the DMC crest on the back right shoulder.

Regular fit fine jersey 30/1 combed ring spun 100% cotton

We recommend washing in cold water and line drying.

description:

Adorned with the DMC crest on the back right shoulder.

name: Lightin' Em Up
description:
"Lightin' Em Up" in black.

Adorned with the DMC crest on the back right shoulder.

Regular fit fine jersey 30/1 combed ring spun 100% cotton

We recommend washing in cold water and line drying.

name: Journal Entry No. 96 (Never Trouble Trouble)
description:
"Never trouble trouble till trouble troubles you" is from our Journal Series.  These are excerpts from the journal of William Howard.  The entry is dated July 3, 1903

Adorned with the DMC crest on the back right shoulder.

Regular fit fine jersey 30/1 combed ring spun 100% cotton

We recommend washing in cold water and line drying.

name: Journal Entry No. 326 (The Sun Even Shines)
description:
"The Sun Even Shines" is from the Journal Series.  These are excerpts from the journal of William Howard.  The entry (which can be viewed on our blog) reads
"September 7, 1921 My cousin Andrew seems to have gotten lucky with an investment he made - I suppose the sun even shines on a dog's ass once in awhile."

Adorned with the DMC crest on the back right shoulder.

Regular fit fine jersey 30/1 combed ring spun 100% cotton

We recommend washing in cold water and line drying.

name: Journal Entry No. 23 (By Hook Or By Crook)
description:
"By hook or by crook" is from the Journal Series.  These are excerpts from the journal of William Howard.  The entry reads
“June 2, 1897 Scott and I will make this odd partnership work by hook or by crook.”

Adorned with the DMC crest on the back right shoulder.

Regular fit fine jersey 30/1 combed ring spun 100% cotton

We recommend washing in cold water and line drying.

name: Journal Entry No. 301 (Bulls Make Money)
description:
"Bulls Make Money" is from the Journal Series.  These are excerpts from the journal of William Howard.  The entry reads:
"December 3, 1919 My friend Daniel, who works at the New York Stock Exchange, always said  'Bulls make money, bears make money, pigs get slaughtered'."

Adorned with the DMC crest on the back right shoulder.

Regular fit fine jersey 30/1 combed ring spun 100% cotton

We recommend washing in cold water and line drying.

name: Journal Entry No. 193 (The Truth Is Ugly)
description:
"The Truth is Ugly" is from the Journal Series.  These are excerpts from the journal of William Howard.  The entry reads
"October 23, 1911 The truth is ugly, lie and stay beautiful"

Adorned with the DMC crest on the back right shoulder.

Regular fit fine jersey 30/1 combed ring spun 100% cotton

Available for Men and Women

We recommend washing in cold water and line drying.

name: Journal Entry No. 373 (Leave Your Mark)
description:
"Leave Your Mark" is from the Journal Series.  These are excerpts from the journal of William Howard.  This is the last entry of the journal - it reads:
"February 17, 1933 There is little time in life, leave your mark on the world."

Adorned with the DMC crest on the back right shoulder.

Regular fit fine jersey 30/1 combed ring spun 100% cotton

Available for Men and Women.

We recommend washing in cold water and line drying.

name: Sisters
description:
Sisters T in vintage black from the Antiques Series.  The illustrations in the Antiques Series come from a stack of designs found in the trunk that spawned the 2010 rebirth of Devil May Care Clothing Company.

Adorned with the DMC logo on the back right shoulder.  Hand dyed women’s slim fit crew tee made from 40’s 100% cotton jersey.  Wash in cold water, line drying recommended.

Please take note that this shirts is slim fit. If you prefer a looser fit then we recommended you go up a size.

name: Journal Entry No. 65 (Nothing Good) Baseball Shirt
description:
The Journal Entry No. 65 Baseball shirt is a limited edition - once they are sold out they will not be reprinted.

The first release in the Journal Series.  These are excerpts from the journal of William Howard.  The entry reads:
“August 10, 1897    Went to the saloon with Mr. Scott last night; Nothing good happens after midnight.”

Adorned with the DMC crest on the back right shoulder.  Unisex vintage inspired Burnout fabric are hand-treated and authentically weathered for a perfectly worn-in look and feel. Made from 30's Burnout: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester.

We recommend washing in cold water and line drying.

Please take note that this shirt is slim fit. If you prefer a looser fit then we recommended you go up a size.

name: DMC Script Thermal
description:
DMC Script Thermal in ink. Adorned with the DMC logo on the back right shoulder. Unisex slim fit thermal crew. Made from 100% cotton waffle thermal. Wash in cold water, line drying recommended.

Please take note that our shirts are slim fit. If you prefer a looser fit then we recommended you go up a size.

name: Devil May Care Classic Baseball Shirt
description:
The Devil May Care Classic Baseball shirt is a limited edition - once they are sold out they will not be reprinted.

This is the Classic Devil May Care Logo as seen on our hangtags.  It’s also adorned with the DMC crest on the back right shoulder.

Unisex vintage inspired Burnout fabric are hand-treated and authentically weathered for a perfectly worn-in look and feel. Made from 30's Burnout: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester.

We recommend washing in cold water and line drying.

Please take note that this shirt is slim fit. If you prefer a looser fit then we recommended you go up a size.

name: DMC Multi Crest in Barnwood
description:
The DMC multi Crest long sleeve is adorned with three large DMC crests on the lower left side and a small Devil May Care print on the upper right shoulder.

This shirt is also available in Walnut brown.

This unisex long sleeve tee is authentically weathered with imperfectly perfect striations.  Made from 20's Eco-Heather: 50% Polyester (6.25% recycled), 38% Cotton (6.25% organic), 12% Rayon.

We recommend washing in cold water and line drying.
Please take note that our shirts are slim fit. If you prefer a looser fit then we recommended you go up a size.

name: DMC Tote
description:
The DMC Shopping Tote has 8" dual handles with contrast handle wrap. Made from 100% natural cotton.

Measurements: 16" H x 15" W x 6.5" L
